title: Parameters for Synchronization of RoI Fusion Nodes

rois_timestamp_offsets.description: An array of timestamp offsets for each camera [s].

timeout_ms.description: A timeout value can be assigned within a single frame [s].

image_buffer_size.description: The number of image buffer size for debug.

point_project_to_unrectified_image.description: An array of options indicating whether to project point to unrectified image or not.

filter_scope_min_x.description: Minimum x position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_min_y.description: Minimum y position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_min_z.description: Minimum z position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_max_x.description: Maximum x position to be considered for debug [m].

filter_scope_max_y.description: Maximum y position to be considered for debug [m].

approximate_camera_projection.description: An array of options indicating whether to use approximated projection for each camera.

approximation_grid_cell_width.description: The width of grid cell used in approximated projection [pixel].

approximation_grid_cell_height.description: The height of grid cell used in approximated projection [pixel].

type.description: Set it to `advanced` if you want to use more accurate and complicated logic for matching LiDAR and camera; otherwise, set it to `naive`.

threshold.description: A maximum threshold value to synchronize RoIs from multiple cameras [s].

rois_timestamp_noise_window.description: List of camera timestamp noise windows in seconds. The noise values should be specified in the same order as the input_topics.
